violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

nodes.html:
<button tabindex="0" aria-label="Avvis" id="declineButton" class="coi-banner__decline" role="alert" aria-atomic="true" style="display: flex;">
                        Avvis
                    </button>
